original_text: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.
korean_text: 성령과 신부가 말씀하시기를 오라 하시는도다 듣는 자도 오라 할 것이요 목마른 자도 올 것이요 또 원하는 자는 값없이 생명수를 받으라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come.
And let him that heareth say, Come.
And let him that is athirst come.
let him take the water of life freely.
